trans-unit.source: Provides event data for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati di evento per il <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerEventArgs object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto RoleManagerEventArgs fornisce informazioni sugli eventi all' <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento di <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerEventArgs object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto RoleManagerEventArgs fornisce l'accesso per il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>della richiesta corrente e un `Boolean` <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>proprietà viene utilizzata per abilitare o annullare la creazione di un <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>da<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs"></xref> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*> property to the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs"> </xref> classe e imposta il <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*>proprietà all'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>oggetto fornisce informazioni sugli eventi all' <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento di <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>oggetto fornisce l'accesso per il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>della richiesta corrente e un `Boolean` <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>proprietà viene utilizzata per abilitare o annullare la creazione di un <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>da <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> per la richiesta corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>oggetto fornisce informazioni sugli eventi all' <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento di <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di contesto fornisce l'accesso per il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>della richiesta corrente.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> per la richiesta corrente

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether role information has been applied to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se le informazioni sui ruoli sono state applicate all'utente corrente.

trans-unit.source: The RolesPopulated property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà RolesPopulated viene utilizzata per abilitare o annullare la creazione di un <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>da <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: If set to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> assumes that role membership for the current user has been verified and any required role membership information has been set up for the current user.
trans-unit.target: Se impostato su `true` nel <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento, il <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>presuppone che l'appartenenza al ruolo per l'utente corrente è stato verificato e le necessarie informazioni di appartenenza al ruolo sono state configurate per l'utente corrente.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: No action is taken by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> to create a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object for the current user.
trans-unit.target: Viene eseguita alcuna azione dal <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>per creare un <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>per l'utente corrente.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if role information has been applied to the current user; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se sono state applicate le informazioni sui ruoli per l'utente corrente. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
